net.marfgamer.jraknet.example.chat.server

Class ConnectedClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.example.chat.server.ConnectedClient

  • public class ConnectedClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a client connect to a ChatServer and is used to easy set status, send chat messages, etc.
    Author:
    MarfGamer
